programmes.show_description: Kick back and relax with some mellow moments. Chilled to perfection.
Jenny is back in the 90s with killer cuts & some proper full-on guitar action! Including Guns n Roses, Nirvana, Bon Jovi, Oasis, The Offspring & Lenny Kravitz.
Non-stop 90s guitar rock, Brit Pop & power ballads! From Bon Jovi & Blur to Def Leppard, Queen & REM.
A complete rundown of the 30 biggest selling UK singles in 2006, all smash hits 20 years ago! Plus a song about a JCB!
Let the party begin. Huge feel good anthems & sing-out-loud classics - all from the decade of dance!
BRIT winner for Outstanding Contribution Mark Ronson has been making bangers since 2003! Here's some of his greatest work featuring Dua Lipa, Amy Winehouse, Lily Allen & RAYE!
Dust off your flip phones and get ready to dance the day away with the ultimate collection of hits that'll transport you back to those unforgettable millenium parties!
Actors that can sing? Who'd have thought! Abz runs down the great and the not so great of 90s singing comedians, soapstars, TV presenters & Hollywood A-listers!
Every track a smash hit in the 90s or 00s, every video a UK chart number one. What more could you possibly need in life?
1993 gave us the milestone 25th release in the NOW series. Here are all 34 videos from CD1 & CD2, back to back & in order! Expect Freddie, Kim & a bit of REM!
Songs in 1993 that you may have forgotten from artists you'll certainly know!
30 massive solo hits from artists who broke up acrimoniously, to those who took a solo stint before returning to the warm bosom of their bands!
Dust off your flip phones and get ready to dance the day away with the ultimate collection of hits that'll transport you back to those unforgettable millenium parties!
Ladies and Gentlemen we give you the biggest selling UK girl group of the 21st Century - Girls Aloud. Lets enjoy 13 of their biggest hits!
Songs you really like but are a bit too embarrassed to admit. Don't worry, we're all in the same boat here & Pat urges you to try to have a little less shame in your musical game!
The biggest party songs & sing-out-loud anthems from the 90s & 00s to provide the perfect soundtrack to your weekend!
The biggest party songs & sing-out-loud anthems from the 90s & 00s to provide the perfect soundtrack to your weekend!
Dust off your flip phones and get ready to dance the day away with the ultimate collection of hits that'll transport you back to those unforgettable millenium parties!
Dust off your flip phones and get ready to dance the day away with the ultimate collection of hits that'll transport you back to those unforgettable millenium parties!
Celebrate 40 Great British musical icons! Enjoy the best in pop, rock, dance and more. Each artist or group a genuine Brit music legend.
The biggest party songs & sing-out-loud anthems from the 90s & 00s to provide the perfect soundtrack to your weekend!
BRIT winner for Outstanding Contribution Mark Ronson has been making bangers since 2003! Here's some of his greatest work featuring Dua Lipa, Amy Winehouse, Lily Allen & RAYE!
Every track a smash hit in the 90s or 00s, every video a UK chart number one. What more do you need for your weekend?
Two decades of BRIT icons with every Best British Single winner from 1990 to 2009! From Britpop battles to pop explosions these are the anthems you can sing every word of!
The biggest party songs & sing-out-loud anthems from the 90s & 00s to provide the perfect soundtrack to your weekend!
Red, White & Blue - and that's just Pat! This is a 2 hour Sharp Selection of homegrown hitmakers of the 90s - from Take That & Texas to Cathy Dennis & Wet Wet Wet.
Your unofficial BRITs warm up party with sing-out-loud anthems & the biggest party hits from British and International superstars.
BRIT winner for Outstanding Contribution Mark Ronson has been making bangers since 2003! Here's some of his greatest work featuring Dua Lipa, Amy Winehouse, Lily Allen & RAYE!
Your unofficial BRITs warm up party with sing-out-loud anthems & the biggest party hits from British and International superstars.
Ain't no party like a BRITs warm-up party! We've got it sorted with 40 of the UK's WannaBe's, Angels & greatest singalong anthems to get you in the mood!
The biggest party songs & sing-out-loud anthems from the 90s & 00s to provide the perfect soundtrack to your weekend!
275 songs reached number 1 across the 00s - a record - so there are bound to be a few you've long forgotten! Pat Sharp digs out 30, including David Sneddon, Meck and Orson.
The biggest party songs & sing-out-loud anthems from the 90s & 00s to provide the perfect soundtrack to your weekend!
